character.name: Natasha
description: An <c=textBold>actual</c> hacker. Her cards often <c=keyword>exhaust after several uses</c> and <c=keyword>apply negative statuses to enemies</c>.

Reprogrammed.name: Reprogrammed
Reprogrammed.description: The next <c=midrow>object</c> launched by this ship is replaced with a <c=midrow>Repair Kit</c>.

Deprogrammed.name: Deprogrammed
Deprogrammed.description: The next <c=midrow>object</c> launched by this ship is replaced with an <c=midrow>Asteroid</c>.

Backdoor.name: BACKDOOR
Backdoor.description: Whenever all uses of a <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card are spent, your enemy gains 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c>.

DarkWebData.name: DARK WEB DATA
DarkWebData.description: Choose a card that <c=cardtrait>exhausts</c>. Replace its <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> with <c=cardtrait>Limited 2</c>.

ui.title: Select a card to replace <c=cardtrait>Exhaust</c> with <c=cardtrait>Limited 2</c>, forever.

Forkbomb.name: FORKBOMB
Forkbomb.description: Once per combat, whenever your enemy gains a negative status, they gain 1 more.

Keylogger.name: KEYLOGGER
Keylogger.description: After you end your turn with more than 0 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>, give 1 extra use to a random <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card in your hand, or draw pile, or discard pile.

NetworkComputing.name: NETWORK COMPUTING
NetworkComputing.description: Whenever you play a <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card, play it again for free (if it still has uses left). <c=downside><c=cardtrait>Limited</c> cards get 1 less use.</c>

OperationAltair.name: OPERATION ALTAIR
OperationAltair.description: Each combat, you may choose a non-<c=cardtrait>limited</c>, non-<c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> card in your deck to become <c=cardtrait>Limited 2</c>.
OperationAltair.chooseUiTitle: Select a card to add <c=cardtrait>limited</c> to.

RamDisk.name: RAM DISK
RamDisk.description: <c=cardtrait>Limited</c> cards get 3 extra uses. <c=downside><c=cardtrait>Limited 1</c> now makes cards <c=cardtrait>single use</c> instead of <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c>.</c>

TraceProtectionLink.name: TRACE PROTECTION LINK
TraceProtectionLink.description: Whenever you play a <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

Books.name: TBD
Books.description: Whenever you gain any amount of <c=status>SHARD</c>, gain 1 more. After you play a card that made you gain <c=status>SHARD</c> or <c=action>launch</c> a <c=midrow>Geode</c>, make it <c=cardtrait>limited 2</c> until end of combat.

Cat.name: TBD
Cat.description: Your enemy gains 1 random negative status each turn.

Dizzy.name: TBD
Dizzy.description: Each combat, your enemy starts with 2 <c=status>MITOSIS</c>. The first time your enemy's <c=status>SHIELD</c> reduces to 0 each combat, they lose 2 <c=status>MITOSIS</c> and you gain 1.

Drake.name: TBD
Drake.description: Your <c=action>piercing</c> and <c=action>stunning</c> attacks apply 1 <c=status>ENGINE LOCK</c> on hit.

Max.name: TBD
Max.description: Once per turn, whenever a card is <c=cardtrait>exhausted</c>, swap it with the <c=keyword>leftmost</c> card in hand instead, if possible.

Peri.name: TBD
Peri.description: The first time the enemy gains any status during each of your turns, gain 1 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c>.

Riggs.name: TBD
Riggs.description: Every time your discard pile is shuffled back into your draw pile, give a random <c=cardtrait>limited</c> card an extra use, preferring cards in your hand.

description.A: Play all already exhausted <c=cardtrait>limited</c> cards. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.

description.None: Launch an <c=midrow>asteroid</c> from the chosen part.
description.A: Launch an <c=midrow>asteroid</c> from the chosen part.
description.B: Launch a <c=midrow>random static object</c> from the chosen part.

description.None: Trigger an enemy intent or <c=midrow>midrow object</c>.
description.A: Trigger an enemy intent or <c=midrow>midrow object</c>. <c=action>Impulsive</c>: <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> by 1.
description.B: Trigger an enemy intent or <c=midrow>midrow object</c>.

description.None: Give +1 use to <c=cardtrait>limited</c> cards in hand.
description.A: Give +2 uses to <c=cardtrait>limited</c> cards in hand.
description.B: Give +1 use to <c=cardtrait>limited</c> cards in hand.

description.None: If your enemy has no <c=status>corrode</c>, they gain 1.
description.A: If your enemy has no <c=status>corrode</c>, they gain 1.
description.B: If your enemy has no <c=status>corrode</c>, they gain 2.

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BBBBBB>Natasha</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BBBBBB>Natasha</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BBBBBB>Natasha</c> cards to your hand.
